solution_line_template: Will paid ${shoe_cost} for his shoes but then returned them and got 90% of the money back, so he lost 10% of the money, which means {refund_percentage_lost} * ${shoe_cost} = ${<<{refund_percentage_lost}*{shoe_cost}={money_lost_on_shoes}>>}{money_lost_on_shoes} is gone.
Will started with ${initial_money} - ${total_spent} that he spent = ${<<{initial_money}-{total_spent}={money_left}>>}{money_left} remaining.
